From Mr.Michael Bangura
Lagos-Nigeria.
Email:mbangura479@yahoo.co.uk
11 July
ATTN:Roger Biggs

I am Mr.Michael Bangura ,the personal Secretary to
Mr.David Biggs,  a national of your country, who used
to work with shell development company in Nigeria. On
the 21st of April 2000, Mr David, his wife and their
only child were involved in a car accident along
Lagos- Ibadan express Road and all of them died .

Since then I have made several enquiries to locate any
of his extended relatives this has also proved
unsuccessful.

After these several unsuccessful attempts, I decided to
contacted you to assist in repatriating the money and
property left behind by Mr.David before the security
company where he deposited the money could confiscate
or declare it unserviceable.

Particularly, the security company where the deceased
had an account valued at about 10.5million dollars has
issued me a notice to provide the next of kin or have
the account confiscated within the next fourteen
official working days.

Since I have been unsuccessful in locating the
relatives for over 2 years now, I seek your consent to
present you as the next of kin of the deceased
since you have the same last name so that the proceeds
of this account valued at 10.5million dollars can be
paid to you and then you and me can share the money.
60% to me and 40% to you. I have all necessary legal
documents that can be used to backup any claim we may
make.

All I require is your honest cooperation to enable us
see this Business through. I guarantee that this will
be executed under a legitimate arrangement that will
protect you from any breach of the law, hence the
business is 100% risk free.

It shall be well with you.

Best regards,

Michael Bangura .

My Dear Mr Bangura,

I would be quite willing to help you but I fear I am not related to
your former employer. If we were to employ a little deception I am
sure I could pull off a passable imitation as the brother of the
deceased.

Would this ruse be adequate arrangement for your? It may stretch
things legally, however I'm sure David Biggs must have been some kind
of relative as there are not many of us Biggs around.

What are the arrangements for dealing with the money on completion of the deal?

Kind Regards

Roger M Biggs

Thanks for your mail and from every indication, I can
see that, you are a very honest person who may not want
this integrity to be tampered. Honestly speaking, I am
very grateful with your urgent response to my mail and
I am standing firmly here to promise you that you are
dealing with a gentle man with honour, respect and
dignity who has a family of three children, one Girl
and two boys. We are living in #120 falomo
Road,Victoria Island,Lagos-Nigeria.

My private phone number is:234-803-357-1336.You are
free to call me at any time even in the mid-night, I
will respond to your call.

Therefore, do not mistake my intentions as every thing
that i am going to do with you is real, legal and
genuine. So my dear this  deal is real and mandated
on you and since I want absolute confidentiality, If
this transaction is not Genuine I would not have
involved myself ,As such I have a lovely wife and
promising children hence I would not want any thing
that will bring my name to book.

This transaction will be concluded within the specified
time if you will take this transaction as your
personal business.

Be informed that the next line of action now is for
your to send the following information to me which
will enhance the smooth transfer of this fund into
your bank account.

First, we have to identify ourselves to each other
either by forwarding our ID or INTERNETIONAL PASSPORT
or Driver's licence, to ourselves. This is to make sure
we can believe and trust each other. As you can
understand that our passport photographs are very
necessary in this business for easy identification and
also for us to build trust among ourselves.

WHAT TO DO NOW.

1.Please could you furnish me with your, Full
Name, Contact Address for the change of ownership of
this fund to your name as now  the true bonafide owner
of the money.

2.Also forward Your telephone/fax numbers to me for
easy communications as your constant communication will
be highly accepted to enable me furnish you on day to
day activities of this transaction.

3.Your Age, Occupation/Profession and position held.

Please be informed that the documents that will cover
this transaction will be the sole responsibility of an
accredited attorney who will swear an affidavit of
claim on your behalf stating that you are the next of
kin of the deceased. The affidavit would be tendered
to the security company to buttress your claim as the
beneficiary of the fund.

So my dear friend, this transaction is my whole life
and I have spent a whole lot of money to bring it to
this level hence I will not want any body to
jeopardise my chances as you can understand that why I
contacted you was that I can not  carry the
transaction alone.

What I need from you is your seriousness and
dedication to handle this fund once it is at your
custody. Please let confidentiality be our motor hence
it is only a fool that can disclose the source of his
or her success to the public.

Thank you for your good understanding. I enclosed here
with my International Passport for you and please, send
your own to me when replying this mail so that I can
know whom I am doing the business with.

Remain blessed.
Regards,
Michael Bangura.

messages.body:
12 July
Michael Barunga

I do not do any business over the telephone or fax. I do not trust
them as they are far too easy to infiltrate by prying ears. I'm
surprised a business man like yourself would want to go back to the
dark ages when we face a new millennium, if you get my meaning.

Email is good enough for me. I have a state of the art protections
system to scramble messages should unwanted attention try to get a
look in.

What is up with your passport picture? In the US it should be a full
face straight on. We don't sit for no family portrait for a passport
over here. Your passport looks like something Nicky the Greek tried to
sell me for bringing in some new faces from Europe. That bird didn't
fly and Nicky ended up eating concrete for the rest of his natural.

I don't hold a passport. Why the hell would I want to leave the USA to
travel to another country? We got everything here.

I enclose a picture so you can get a measure of the man you are dealing with.

I don't mean to be pushy, you have to understand the kind of man I am,
I like to get things done and be ahead of the game. But does your
security company wish to have my bank details for deposit of the
money?

Please get back to me on this. For now Adolph has a ballet lesson to get to.

Yours warmly

Roger M Biggs

messages.body:
12 July
Mikey

I can call you Mikey, yeah? I used to know a Mikey, great guy, but
business is business.

This is good business. I like the speed you operate at. I tell you, if
only we had some smart guys like you over here. We got problems with
new guys trying to move in. They don't understand business. They're
trash, pure and simple.

We've had this town since the thirties. My Papa, he tells stories
would make your hair turn white. He used to ride high with the big
boys, that was back when we went under the name Biggalletta. My Pappa,
he was the first made man in our family. His mamma was so proud.

You put up $2,500 of your own cash on this? I gotta get you that back.
I'll cover the expenses on this. You can't be expected to make payouts
like that.

So do I just sit tight now and wait for the security company to get in
touch? What about this affidavit? I ain't too good on legal niceties.

I'm going to have to get back to you later, me and the boys are just
going to "take out the trash". You know, yeah.

Roger M Biggs

come to Nigeria to sign the documents because you will
also go to high court here to obtain an affidavit to
make change of ownership of the fund to your name.

About your lawyer over there, if you feel that she can
represent you fine, then she can come. But why I wanted
you to make use of a local attorney is because he will
be at a better position to know what and what to
do. This is because when my people here see your lawyer
as a foreigner, they will make price of things to be
higher than what they give it to people here and then
